Reference

RAT Setup

Functions to set up new readiness assessment tests (RAT). Each of these creates a template RMarkdown file that uses the RAT generation functions below to dynamically generate an iRAT/tRAT based on an Excel template with questions, answer options and answer keys. Both the created RMarkdown and Excel template files can then be further customized to create the desired RAT.

tbl_setup_RAT_template()

Setup a new RAT template

tbl_setup_RAT_demo()

Setup a demo RAT

RAT Generation

Functions to generate readiness assessment tests (RATs). These provide the necessary functionality to create an RAT from its corresponding Excel file, arrange the questions in the desired fixed or random order, and generate the questions and answer choices based on the specified layout and answer key.

tbl_create_RAT_from_data_frame()

Create RAT from data frame

tbl_create_RAT_from_excel()

Create RAT from Excel

tbl_arrange_RAT_questions()

Arrange RAT questions

tbl_generate_RAT_choices()

Generate RAT choices

tbl_default_RAT_layouts()

Retrieve default RAT layouts

Peer Evaluation Setup

Functions to easily generate, test and deploy a shiny application for collecting team-based peer evaluations in a google spreadsheet.

tbl_setup_peer_evaluation()

Set up a peer evaluation app

tbl_duplicate_peer_evaluation()

Duplicate a peer evaluation app

tbl_test_peer_evaluation()

Test run peer evaluation locally

tbl_deploy_peer_evaluation()

Deploy peer evaluation app

tbl_run_peer_evaluation()

Run a peer evaluation app

tbl_generate_access_codes()

Generate random access codes

tbl_check_gs_access()

Check google spreadsheet access

Peer Evaluation Data

Functions to fetch and summarize peer evaluation data from a peer evaluation app.

tbl_fetch_peer_evaluation_data()

Fetch the peer evaluation data

tbl_read_peer_evaluation_data()

Read downloaded peer evaluation data

tbl_summarize_peer_evaluation_data()

Summarize peer evaluation data

tbl_export_peer_evaluation_data()

Export peer evaluation data

tbl_example_peer_evaluation() tbl_example_empty_peer_evaluation() tbl_example_roster()

Example files
